    Mesh3.transform(Mat4 m, Mat4 h)
    Transforms all coordinates and normals in the mesh by a matrix.
    Mesh3
    Mesh3.transform(Transform3 tr)
    Transforms all coordinates and normals in the mesh permanently by a transform.

    Not to be confused with the temporary transformations applied by a mesh entity's transform to the meshes contained within the entity.

    Useful when consolidating multiple mesh entities into one mesh entity.
